title: Blacks and Jews (PBS Documentary - 1997) H.264 moviesbyrizzo

It also considers divisive issues between the two respective camps such as comments shown being made by Black Leader Farrakhan of an anti-semitic nature certainly and an interview of Al Sharpeton refusing to renounce him for it (it seems). Also shown is an interview with noted Jewish Director - the late Mr. Arthur Hiller who was born in my former hometown of Edmonton Canada and in which he comes across clearly as a warmly humanly intelligent person who shows responsiveness to concerns that he is altogether quite willing to deal with - showing flexibility and care in his manner.
